Contradict fact: The claim that a person is on film "burning 80 Trump ballots" is contradicted by the investigation conducted by local officials in Virginia Beach, who concluded that the ballots shown in the video were sample ballots.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a video that has been flagged as misinformation by election officials and has been investigated to be sample ballots.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the ballots shown in the video are official ballots, when in fact they are sample ballots. This assumption is problematic and misleading.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the ballots shown in the video are sample ballots, as concluded by local officials in Virginia Beach.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the video by stating that it shows someone burning 80 Trump ballots, when in reality, the ballots shown are sample ballots and not official ones.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating bias in the provided claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times in the provided information.
